name: @grouparoo/grouparoo
description: The main Grouparoo Application. Learn more at www.grouparoo.com.

scripts.nuke: rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf core/node_modules rm -rf ui/*/node_modules && rm -rf cli/node_modules && rm -rf plugins/*/*/node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf core/dist && rm -rf cli/dist && rm -rf plugins/*/*/dist && rm -rf ui/*/.next
scripts.update: npm-check-updates -u && pnpm exec -- npm-check-updates -u && npm run nuke && pnpm install
